Articles.Content:
I ran into this a just a bit ago and thought you may be interested. It's a bunch of concept art from early in teh shuttle program.

http://io9.com/5946175/
Sweet! Catalog #: 08_00973 is my favorite, it looks like a chunky space version of a commercial airliner
God, I feel old. I remember 08_00958, 08_00983, 08_00984, 08_00861, 08_00860, 08_00862, 08_00962, and 08_00859 from books my dad got me when I was a kid...
